package.name: Contact_Vcard_Parse
package.description: Allows you to parse vCard files and text blocks, and get back an array of the elements of each vCard in the file or text.

release.notes: Finished removing all text-based keys and replaced with integer keys only (e.g., in N components, the first part is now 0, not 'family'). Converted tabs to spaces to be PEAR compliant.
